mapper.sql: ID, BUS_NAME, LICENCE, ACC_REAL_NAME, BANK_NAME, BANK_ACCOUNT, LIMIT_YEAR, SCALE, BUS_DOMAIN, DOMAIN, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, TEL, LICENCE_IMG, CORPORATE_IMG, TRANSATOR_IMG, ADD_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bus_bussiness_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bus_bussiness_info (ID, BUS_NAME, LICENCE, ACC_REAL_NAME, BANK_NAME, BANK_ACCOUNT, LIMIT_YEAR, SCALE, BUS_DOMAIN, DOMAIN, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, TEL, LICENCE_IMG, CORPORATE_IMG, TRANSATOR_IMG, ADD_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{busName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transatorImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUS_NAME = #{record.busName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENCE = #{record.licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACC_REAL_NAME = #{record.accRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update bus_bussiness_info set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUS_NAME = #{record.busName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE = #{record.licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACC_REAL_NAME = #{record.accRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ACCOUNT = #{record.bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIMIT_YEAR = #{record.limitYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCALE = #{record.scale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_DOMAIN = #{record.busDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{record.domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY = #{record.city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENCE_IMG = #{record.licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPORATE_IMG = #{record.corporateImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSATOR_IMG = #{record.transatorImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
